overview: The sixth edition of Bel Ami`s award-winning "Boywatch" series presents 30 more choice specimens discovered in our ongoing search for the most desirable young men in the world.  "Boywatch 6" follows the pattern of its predecessors. The top ten are those whom George Duroy considers to have the best chance of going on to Bel Ami stardom. The remaining twenty are prime examples of the casting auditions we show every day on the BelAmiOnline.com web site.
title: Boy Watch 6
